protein.specific_function: Isoform 5 may be involved in the exocytosis of zymogens by pancreatic acini

reference.reference_text: Koivu T, Laitinen S, Riento K, Olkkonen VM: Sequence of a human cDNA encoding Cab45, a Ca2+-binding protein with six EF-hand motifs. DNA Seq. 1997;7(3-4):217-20.
